title: WHAT WILL IT TAKE RIOT PLZ TELL ME I NEED TO KNOW!!!!!!!!
body: So im a jinx player okay lvl 6 all i want in the world apart from world peace is lvl 7 jinx i got lvl 6 easy now this is kinda beyond a joke riot  29/7/11 as jinx and i got A FUCKING B RANK legit 29 kills and 7 deaths and 11 assists and i got A FUCKING B RANK {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  SO I WANT TO KNOW WHAT WILL IT FUCKING TAKE RIOT!!!!!

replies.body: You can't get mastery tokens in siege mode anyway

Yeah no tokens on summ rift game modes.

Only normal and ranked

So had it been a normal or ranked you should have got an s+ or an s at the least

Is this a recent thing? I got my Annie tokens on URF, If i recall right.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie Bots Wife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ypkb5hdP,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-23T14:38:43.336+0000)
>
> Is this a recent thing? I got my Annie tokens on URF, If i recall right.

came in the week after 2nd urf rotation, you can still get S+ S S-, its just harder and you cant get tokens
Not sure how recent it is but all rotating game modes dont give tokens

> Just as in any rotating queue game mode, we’ve specially tuned Champion Mastery so you can earn points in the mode. You’ll also be able to earn keys for your wins and loot chests for your (or your premade’s) S­-, S, and S+ games. Unlike other Champion Mastery-enabled queues, rotating game modes DO NOT reward mastery tokens towards levels 6 and 7.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-7
But  i got both lvl 6 tokens from urf btw when is urf back out its kinda the only mode on the rgm that we like or doom bots

> [{quoted}](name=im a teemo ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ypkb5hdP,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-07-24T03:37:55.468+0000)
>
> But  i got both lvl 6 tokens from urf btw when is urf back out its kinda the only mode on the rgm that we like or doom bots

This was changed in Patch 6.12. 
> **NO 6 GODS:** Matchmade games on Howling Abyss, Twisted Treeline or any rotating game mode will not award Champ Mastery level 6 or 7 tokens

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-612-notes#patch-champion-mastery
What was your CS like, was it a RGM etc

The game rank takes a lot into consideration, it's not just the KDA. Someone correct me if I'm wrong but it also takes into account CS, objective assists (drag, baron, inhibs, towers) and as mentioned above your lane choice for that champ, lane presence aswell.
I scored my mastery 6 with ashe with an S game that had less kills, more deaths and less assists than a previous game which I scored an A- on. But I believe that's because i had more CS, took a dragon, helped with baron 3 times and took a few inhibs solo. So it must take a lot into account if that's the case

I don't see that game on you're record so without a screen shot or link to the game you're referring to it's hard to give you any advice on what you could of done to get an S. Also you're games with that champ are compared with every other game played by people using that champ. If you're results are not in the top how ever many % you need with that champ then you won't get an S.
